verses.text: Mamin Jehová, a d'ayach tzin col in b'a, mocab' in can d'a q'uixvelal uuj.
Colin, colinel d'a yol sk'ab' eb' ajk'ool yajoch d'ayin, yujto tojol ach. Ab' val tas svala', tzin a colani.
Ochanh venhuloc icha junoc nhaq'ueen b'aj syal in colan in b'a. Ala' to tzin colchaji yujto icha in cuartel aji, icha in nhaq'ueen aji.
Ach in Diosal, colinel d'a eb' chuc, d'a eb' milumcham anima yed' d'a eb' ixtum anima.
Mamin Jehová Vajalil, toxonton yip ach in k'ool yictax d'a in quelemal.
Yictax ix in alji d'a ix in nun, a d'ayach svik' vip. A ach ix in ak' aljoc. Ol ach in b'itejnhej.
Tzijtum mach sat sk'ol yilan tas tzin ik'ani, palta ach in Diosal, anhej d'ayach tzin col in b'a.
Masanil tiempo, sval vach' lolonel d'ayach yuj snivanil elk'ochi.
Manh in a patiquejeli, yujto icham vinaquinxo. Manh in actejcani yujto manhxalaj vip.
A eb' ayoch ajk'olal d'ayin sgana in smilanchamoc, smol yetb'eyum eb', slajtian sb'a eb' d'a in patic.
Syalan eb': Pechec, yamec. Manhxo ayococh Dios yed'oc, manhxalaj mach ol colanel ticnaic, xchi eb'.
Ach in Diosal, manh najatoc tzach el d'a in tz'ey. Cotanh d'a elanhchamel, ochanh ved'oc.
A eb' ayoch ajk'olal d'ayin, chamocab' eb' yuj q'uixvelal. A eb' tz'alan tas chuc d'a in patic yic tzin yixtan eb' yalani, malajocab' tz'ajcan yelk'och eb'.
Palta, a inxo tic ach in Diosal, ayachnhej och yipoc in k'ol d'a junjun rato. Ol ach in b'itej yed' in tzalajk'olal.
Masanil tiempo ol valel yab'ixal a tojolal yed' a colval, vach'chom max nachaj vuuj smasanil.
Mamin Jehová Cajalil, a juntzanh tastac te satub'tac ix a k'ulej, a' ol in b'itej. Ol valel ab'ixal to a achnhej tojol ach.
Ach in Diosal, yictax in quelemal, ix in a k'ayb'ani. Anhejtona' valanel juntzanh tastac nivac b'ob'ilcan uuj ticnaic.
Ach in Diosal, vach'chom icham inxo, sacxo xil in jolom, palta manh in actejcani yic ol yal valanel yab'ixal a poder d'a eb' toto ol aljoc.
Ach in Diosal, yelxo val te nivan a tojolal icha snajatil satchaanh. Nivan tastac ix a k'ulej. Malaj junoc mach icha ach tic.
Vach'chom tzijtum tas ix in ik'ani yed' yaelal ix ak' d'ayin, palta ol in ak'xi pitzvoc. Ol in ik'xiq'ueta d'a sjulal lum luum.
Te nivan ol aj velk'och uuj, ol ak'anpax snivanil in k'ool.
A inxo tic, ol ach in b'itej yujto tzaq'uelk'och tas tzala'. Ol vak'an yuj diosal d'ayach yed' te' arpa yed' te' chinhb'il. Ach in Diosal, co Diosal ach a onh aj israel onh tic.
Ol ach in b'itej d'a tzalajk'olal, yujto ix in a colo'.
Ol valel a tojolal d'a masanil q'uinal. A eb' ix nib'an to ay tas ix in ik'ani, ix telvi eb', ix te q'uixvicanel eb'.
